caption.title: ToE and pace of climate change in ecosystem drivers.
caption.p: Multi-model median of the year when annual extrema exceed the climate change trend (see ‘Methods' section) for ( a) SST, ( b) PP, ( c) pH and ( d) interior oxygen content in the ‘business-as-usual' scenario (RCP8.5). Note the different colour scales for each variable. ( e– h) The pace of climate change: the number of years between the start of climate change and the signal emerging (see ‘Methods' section). White areas indicate where ecosystem stress does not emerge above the range of variability for that parameter by 2100.
